    • Uses of ResourceManager.ResourceReference in com.composum.pages.commons.service

      Classes in com.composum.pages.commons.service that implement ResourceManager.ResourceReference 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      protected class  PagesResourceManager.ReferenceImpl
      the reference to a potentially non existing (static included; can exist but mustn't) content resource this is a simple transferable (JSON) resource description without the overhead of a NonExistingResource and with access to the resources properties (if resource exists), the design and the resource type properties even if the resource ist not existing (to check rules during creation, moving and copying)
      Methods in com.composum.pages.commons.service that return ResourceManager.ResourceReference 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      ResourceManager.ResourceReference PagesResourceManager.getReference​(AbstractModel model)
      the reference of the (existing) resource of a model instance
      ResourceManager.ResourceReference PagesResourceManager.getReference​(org.apache.sling.api.resource.ResourceResolver resolver, com.google.gson.stream.JsonReader reader)
      a reference translated from a JSON object (transferred reference)
      ResourceManager.ResourceReference PagesResourceManager.getReference​(org.apache.sling.api.resource.ResourceResolver resolver, String path, String type)
      a resource referenced by the path and a probably overlayed type; the type can be 'null' if the addressed resource exists, the type should be present if the path is pointing to a non existing resource
      ResourceManager.ResourceReference PagesResourceManager.getReference​(org.apache.sling.api.resource.Resource resource, String type)
      a resource and a probably overlayed type (type can be 'null')
